big vision doesn’t mean big planning (at least until you find a sponsor who understands how to get the return on the investment and is willing to make a long-term commitment..). You can \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"go ahead with small steps\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", but with Garage Innovation Network it is perfectly fine to finish your piece of work, share your conclusions and code, leaving the next iterations to others who will explore the same challenge in the future…\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]}}"
